text: Jab koi nayi surat nazil hoti hai to inmein se baaz log (mazaq ke taur par musalmaano se) puchte hain ke “ kaho, tum mein se kiske iman mein issey izafa hua?” (iska jawab yeh hai ke) jo log iman laye hain unke iman mein to fil-waqai ( har nazil hone wali surat ne) izafa hi kiya hai aur woh issey dilshad (rejoicing) hain
